channel.title: [Suggestion] A new board for the forum
channel.description:
A tutorial board for the forum would be great cause a lot of tutorials are getting pushed away, because of new threads starting and everything and it would be good just because fo the conveniency. We already have one for Scar. Why not have one for the "other" category too, and also for server devolpment. I noticed a lot of Miss something's tutorials and other people's pushed down. It would help soo much.
Please add the board. Thank you.
~Ron [br][size=1]Posted at: April 29, 2006, 07:46:05 am[/size][hr]grunt

item.title: [Suggestion] A new board for the forum
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

S!ms:

[quote author=jme_009 link=topic=2242.msg28776#msg28776 date=1147487182]
Hmm... If I can find a cracked version of blitz3d(Which I have been looking for ages), I will write up a tutorial on creating a 3d game.

If anyone can find the full working version of blitz3d, I could really use it I have looked far and wide, and downloaded 2 viruses already.

1.8.3 updated version:

Name: kamla D. Winters
S/N: Q12-EOYTU-Y6G8S-T7WJE-7A

crack: http://www.metacrawl.ws/dl3.php?QmxpdHozRC52MS44Ni5VcGRhdGUuT25seS1TU0cuWklQ

should work :)[/quote]

Unfortunatly the demo version doesnt use a serial or anything, you need the full version to enter a serial number, lol. And I cannot find the full version download of it. I have a registered copy, but it didnt even ask for a serial, and when I use it on another computer it just says this licence has expired :S

Read full topic
